description.raw:
While making a patch release of ign-gazebo1, I saw an error message at the end of the console output from `release.py`:

~~~
...
- Linux: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-gazebo-debbuilder/buildWithParameters?...
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/developer/release-tools/release.py", line 535, in <module>
    go(sys.argv)
  File "/home/developer/release-tools/release.py", line 502, in go
    for d in distros:
TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable
~~~

I believe this is because [ign-gazebo-release](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo-release/src) doesn't have debian/sid or debian/stretch metadata, only Ubuntu. This patch should suppress the complaint if a repo doesn't have any debian distro metadata.

...
- Linux: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-gazebo-debbuilder/buildWithParameters?...

    go(sys.argv)
  File "/home/developer/release-tools/release.py", line 502, in go
    for d in distros:
TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable

I believe this is because ign-gazebo-release doesn't have debian/sid or debian/stretch metadata, only Ubuntu. This patch should suppress the complaint if a repo doesn't have any debian distro metadata.

title.raw: release.py: disable error message if no debian distro metadata is present
title.html: release.py: disable error message if no debian distro metadata is present
